-e ---

𒁮 ≈ 𒊩𒐀𒐺𒁹

𒁮 DAM Dom / Dame 𒈬𒌅 mutu ⇔ Mother

𒁮 DAM ≈ 𒌉 dumu banda₃ Bund in 𒁮𒌉𒁕 damᵘban₃da wife kinder

𒁮 DAM δάμαρ dámar (wife) γαμετή gametḗ

𒁮 dam deem "believe" ≈ 𒌓 TAM τῑμάω tīmáō “honour” "to trust; to believe"

𓈞 𓏏 𓁐, 𓈟 𓏏 𓁐, 𓊃 𓏏

𓎛𓃀 𓋴𓇋𓇋𓏏𓋳 | wife | háw̄a … 𓋴𓇋𓇋𓏏 зуда zuda 𒁮 aššatu

𒁮𒃼 damʳgar₃ da'mercar merchant , trader !

𒍑 ĝid Gatte / Gattin

𒁮 𒉡 𒌇𒈨 𒂗
Dame no-dume han.
I have no(t) wife.

𒁮 ᵇalat "wife" baalat vs lord

Dom Dame domaine

𒀉𒁮 adam a2-dam "domaine, habitation" #namû

𒊩𒍑𒁮 ĝidlam Gattin 𒍑𒁮 ĝídlam Gatte < gamete
𒊩𒍑𒁮 #aššatu 𒀸𒊭𒌅
𒊩𒍑𒁮 #nitadam 𒄭𒄿𒅕𒌅 ḫīrtu "spouse"
𒊩𒍑𒁮 ⇔ 𒈬𒌓𒈾 mu-ud-na (Emesal)

𒁮𒀭𒊏 dam an-ra the wife of An
𒁮𒉡𒍼 dam-nu-gig "his wife..."

𒁮𒃼 tamkārum | merchant | 𒌓𒅗𒊒 tam-ka-ru tangār تاجر tāgir
𒌓𒅗𒊒 t'mar-ka-ru | the merchant | “tamkārum derived from م ك ر m-k-r” ☑ (to march 𓊖)

𒁮 dame vs damn 𒊩𒅆𒌨𒌓 limᵇutu “bad” evil 𒊩𒅆𒎕 #damqati damn good 𒅆𒎕𒁕 damqatu damn'good benefits (𒁕 droit:right)
